name: QuanticCollpase
description:
QuanticCollapse - @quicorax 

Engage in different missions to destroy the enemy starships using your match 3 control panel to redirect your vessels' energy to its different systems. Strategically choose to empower your weapons, shields, thrusters or radar to ensure the victory on these galactic combats.

---

Project developed in 4 months

Developed by: Quim Colobrans Ramirez.

Free assets from:

- Kenney Assets: UI elements.

- Quaternius: Raw 3D starship models.

- EkoZero7:  Exo Space Text Font.
